banner.content: The first NFT decentralized trading platform established using an independent public

extension.download: You will need to install the Polkadot {.js} extension to use NFTMart
extension.account: Please use Polkadot extension create or import your account

NftCard.componentCollectionPriceTooltip: The offer price of this NFT

Collection.title: -NFTMart|A Professional NFT Market
Collection.logoRule: This image will also be used for navigation. 300 x 300 recommended.
Collection.featuredRule: This image will be used for featuring your collection on the homepage, category pages, or other promotional areas of NFTMart. 600 x 400 recommended.
Collection.name: *Name
Collection.nameRule: Only letters, numbers, and hyphens are supported,50 characters or less.
Collection.urlRule: Customize your URL on NFTMart. Must only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens, 50 characterscters or less.
Collection.descriptionRule: Markdown syntax is supported. 1000 characterscters or less.

Create.title: General Settings
Create.logoRule: File types supported: JPG, PNG, GIF. Max size: 100 MB
Create.featuredRule: This image will be used for featuring your collection on the homepage, category pages, or other promotional areas of NFTMart. 600 x 400 recommended.
Create.name: *Name
Create.nameRule: Only letters, numbers, and hyphens are supported,80 characters or less.
Create.urlRule: NFTMart will include a link to this URL on this item's detail page, so that users can click to learn more about it. You are welcome to link to your own webpage with more details.200 characters or less.
Create.descriptionRule: The description will be included on the item's detail page underneath its image. Markdown syntax is supported.1000 characters or less.

Detail.title: -NFTMart|A Professional NFT Market
Detail.saveExplain: * Item will not be modified after saved on the chain, please carefully confirm
Detail.fixedPriceExplain: *You can buy this item immediately using Fixed Price
Detail.cancelDesc: Do you want to cancel this order?
Detail.dealDesc: Do you want to accept this offer?
Detail.offerExplain: *If the owner accepts, the transaction will be automatically executed

SellSetting.title: Set Price-NFTMart|A Professional NFT Market
SellSetting.priceExplain: Will be on sale until you transfer this item or cancel it.
SellSetting.startingPriceExplain: A gradual reduction will begin at this price.
SellSetting.endingPriceExplain: Must be less than or equal to the starting price. The price will progress linearly to this amount until the expiration date.Price reduction every 30 minutes;
SellSetting.expirationDateExplain: If no one bids by the expiration date, it will be cancelled
SellSetting.turnToEnglishAuctionExplain: When someone bids, it is automatically converted to a British auction, with markup allowed.
SellSetting.minimumMarkupExplain: Each auction needs to increase the proportion of the previous auction price
SellSetting.automaticDelayExplain: If less than 30 minutes have passed since the last auction, the deadline will be automatically delayed.
SellSetting.pledgeExplain: When it's cancled or sold,the bonded goes back to you.
SellSetting.InstructionsExplain: NFTmart is a fully decentralized NFT exchange, all your operations will be on the blockchain, and anyone can buy your NFT through the blockchain, not just through the NFTmart.io website.
SellSetting.listingExplainOne: Your item will be listed for
SellSetting.bountiesExplain: Reward the person who introducess the buyer.
SellSetting.royaltiesExplain: Royalties will be automatically paid to the beneficiary of the copyright of the item in the following proportion:
SellSetting.taxExplain: Listing is free!At the time of sale, a transaction tax will be levied.
